trans-unit.source: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表控制項，資料行或資料列之間相等間距<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The GridSplitter control redistributes space between rows or columns in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, without changing the dimensions of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: GridSplitter 控制項之間的資料列或資料行中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>，而不變更維度的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid></xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>間距

trans-unit.source: For example, when a GridSplitter resizes two columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of one column is increased while at the same time the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> property of the other column is decreased by the same amount.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當 GridSplitter 調整兩個資料行，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>的一個資料行的屬性會在同一時間而增加<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>其他資料行的屬性就會以相同的量減少。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical GridSplitter by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties and by leaving the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> properties set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示如何藉由設定定義水平或垂直 GridSplitter<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性，藉由保留<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>屬性設定為其預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: **How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter type|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> value|<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Resizes rows|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |Resizes columns|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is greater than or equal to <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the columns.
trans-unit.target: **如何建立垂直和水平 GridSplitter 控制項**|GridSplitter 類型 |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>值 |<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>值 | |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |調整資料列 |<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |調整資料行 |<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| |如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>大於或等於<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>，這會調整大小之資料行。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A> is less than <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>, this resizes the rows.|<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| A GridSplitter can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A><xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A>，這會調整大小之資料列。 |<xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment>|<xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment>| GridSplitter 可以重疊的資料列或資料行，其中包含其他內容，或可能會佔用的資料列或資料行本身。</xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to define a GridSplitter, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何定義 GridSplitter 的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 調整大小的資料列使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 調整大小的資料行使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property settings do not achieve the desired GridSplitter behavior, you can change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性設定並不會達到所要的 GridSplitter 行為，您可以變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>屬性設定。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: A GridSplitter may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: 其他<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>集合</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>中所包含的物件可能會變模糊 GridSplitter

trans-unit.source: For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何避免發生這種情況下，請參閱[How to︰ 請確定 GridSplitter 是看得見](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者必須將拖曳滑鼠來調整資料列或資料行的最小距離<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The minimum distance that is defined by DragIncrement is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse.
trans-unit.target: DragIncrement 所定義的最小距離是當使用者拖曳滑鼠持續重新初始化。

trans-unit.source: For example, when you drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> by the DragIncrement amount, the rows or columns are resized.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當您拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>DragIncrement 短距離資料列或資料行而調整大小。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> the same amount.
trans-unit.target: 若要調整大小詳細資料列和資料行，您必須將拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>相同的數量。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> are made in multiples of the DragIncrement.
trans-unit.target: 因此，變更會藉由使用滑鼠或鍵盤來移動的資料行和資料列大小為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>進行 DragIncrement 的倍數。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 值，表示使用者必須使用滑鼠拖曳的最小距離<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>調整大小的資料列或資料行。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.DragIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance that each press of an arrow key moves a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每個按下方向鍵移動的距離<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The distance that the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> moves for each press of an arrow key.
trans-unit.target: 之間的距離， <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>移動的每個按下方向鍵。

trans-unit.source: The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 10。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.KeyboardIncrement*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates the implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 建立實作<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 新<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridSplitterAutomationPeer"></xref>這個<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Called when a key is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 當按下按鍵時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control loses keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 時呼叫<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項失去鍵盤焦點。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in the dimensions of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 維度中的變更會回應<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control determines what type of pointer to display after its <xref:System.Windows.Size> is set.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>控制項會決定何種指標之後，顯示其<xref:System.Windows.Size>設定。</xref:System.Windows.Size> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的大小變更的相關資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control preview indicator that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定樣式，可自訂外觀、 效果或其他樣式特性<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項預覽區中的顯示時機<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>屬性設定為<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: When you set styles, there are some restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定樣式時，但有一些限制。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Styling and Templating](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[設定樣式和範本](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values `ResourceExtension` One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`.
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 屬性使用方式``` ``` # # XAML 值`ResourceExtension`下列其中之一︰`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。

trans-unit.source: See [XAML Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: `StyleResourceKey` The key that identifies the style being requested.
trans-unit.target: `StyleResourceKey`識別所要求的樣式的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key refers to an existing resource in a <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵參考<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>.</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionary>中現有的資源

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 屬性項目語法是可行，但不是建議。

trans-unit.source: See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[內嵌樣式和樣板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A binding reference using or <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding> is also possible, but uncommon.
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結參考或<xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>也是可行的但不常見。</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None | 預覽變更資料列或資料行的界限會顯示在使用者拖曳時控制項，而屬性設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者放開滑鼠按鈕時，會設定資料行和資料列的界限。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref> for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> dimensions as you move the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Windows.Style"></xref>預覽指示器會顯示可能會變更在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>維度，當您移動<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.
trans-unit.target: 預設為目前的主題所提供的樣式。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.PreviewStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control is defined.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定欄或列而調整大小相對於資料行或資料列的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>定義控制項。

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>，調整資料列或欄大小，請將<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> or ResizeBehavior default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果您無法藉由設定來達成所要的行為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性，變更<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A>或 ResizeBehavior 預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 調整大小的資料列使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 調整大小的資料行使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指出哪些資料行或資料列而調整大小由此<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeBehavior"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control resizes rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項會調整大小的資料列或資料行。

trans-unit.source: To specify a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> that resizes rows or columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>，調整資料列或欄大小，請將<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> properties, change the ResizeDirection or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> default values.
trans-unit.target: 如果您無法藉由設定來達成所要的行為<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>屬性，變更 ResizeDirection 或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A>預設值。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[如何︰ 調整大小的資料列使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[如何︰ 調整大小的資料行使用 GridSplitter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定是否要調整資料列或資料行的大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridResizeDirection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>控制項更新資料行或資料列大小，當使用者拖曳控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> requires an <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>需要<xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>物件為其父樹狀結構中存在才能顯示拖曳預覽的意見反應。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: This requirement is typically met by the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is available in the default style for the <xref:System.Windows.Window> or in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object that is created by a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> object.
trans-unit.target: 通常為了滿足此需求<xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>物件所提供的預設樣式<xref:System.Windows.Window>或<xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>物件所建立的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Window> </xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>

trans-unit.source: However, if neither of these is available, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control must define its own <xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> object.
trans-unit.target: 不過，如果任一這些可用，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>控制項必須定義它自己<xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator>物件。</xref:System.Windows.Documents.AdornerDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None| When the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown.
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None | 當 ShowsPreview 屬性設定為`true`，會顯示預覽中的資料列或資料行大小的變更。

trans-unit.source: The actual size changes when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 實際大小變更時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>釋放。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果屬性設定為`false`，資料行或資料列的大小會即時更新為使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: If the keyboard is used to move the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the ShowsPreview property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用鍵盤來移動<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>控制項、 資料行或資料列的大小會即時更新即使 ShowsPreview 屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref> preview is displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter"></xref>預覽會顯示; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ShowsPreview*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
